label: processCondition
comment: A process condition, expressed as text, for this acknowledgement document.
A process condition, expressed as text, for this document status.
A process condition, expressed as text, for this referenced document.

domainIncludes.comment: A document exchanged between parties for a business application level acknowledgement of the receipt of information.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
The information relevant to a condition related to a document.
